meanings.definition: To incline or bend from a vertical position
meanings.sent1: She leant against the wall for support.
meanings.sent2: He leant over the railing to get a better view.
meanings.sent3: The tree leant towards the sunlight, eager for warmth.
meanings.sent4: The old building leant to one side, showing its age.
meanings.sent5: The tired hiker leant on their walking stick, catching their breath.

meanings.definition: To rely on for support or assistance
meanings.sent1: She leant on her friend for emotional support.
meanings.sent2: He leant on his experience to guide him through the challenge.
meanings.sent3: The student leant on their notes during the exam, hoping for help.
meanings.sent4: In tough times, we often leant on each other for strength.
meanings.sent5: The team leant on their captain for leadership in the final moments of the game.
